ResearchProjectDef.description: As children of Aulë, the dwarf-folk are of a different make from the rest of Eru Ilúvatar's children, like men or elves. Dwarven proportions require special tailoring. Unlocked comfortably sized Dwarven apparel includes:\n- Dwarf tunic\n- Dwarf pants

ResearchProjectDef.description: Prepare your dwarves with armor and helmets for the horrors of war:\n- Longbeard chaincoat and helmet\n- Dwarf-shield

ResearchProjectDef.label: Armor of the Iron Hills
ResearchProjectDef.description: Thicken your dwarves with iron apparel inspired by the dwarves from the iron hills:\n- Hill-dwarf armor and helmet\n- Hill-dwarf shield

ResearchProjectDef.label: Armor of the Kingdom Under the Mountain
ResearchProjectDef.description: Inlay, shape, and produce armor with stunning unrivaled quality worthy of a true kingdom under the mountain:\n- Mountain-dwarf armor and helmet\n- Mountain-dwarf shield

ResearchProjectDef.description:
The natural dwarven inclination to craft creates impressive furniture:
- Dwarven stool
- Dwarven table
- Dwarven end table
- Dwarven dresser
- Dwarven game table

- Dwarven chandelier
- Dwarven candelabra

- Dwarven dresser
